list.name: repo_id
list.label: Repo
list.query: SELECT repo AS __text, toString(id) AS __value FROM repos ORDER BY repo

list.name: team_id
list.label: Team
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ifNull(team_id, 'unassigned') AS __text, ifNull(team_id, 'unassigned') AS __value FROM user_metrics_daily ORDER BY __text

panels.title: Reviews Given / User / Week
panels.description: Requires PR review facts. If empty, reviews are not being ingested yet.

targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfWeek(day) AS week, author_email AS user, sum(reviews_given_latest) AS reviews_given FROM ( SELECT day, author_email, argMax(reviews_given, computed_at) AS reviews_given_latest FROM user_metrics_daily WHERE repo_id = toUUID('${repo_id}') AND ifNull(team_id, 'unassigned') IN (${team_id:sqlstring}) AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, author_email ) GROUP BY week, user ORDER BY week DESC, reviews_given DESC

panels.title: PR Pickup Time p50 — hours
panels.description: PR opened → first comment/review/approval. Requires PR comment/review facts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, argMax(pr_pickup_time_p50_hours, computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily WHERE repo_id = toUUID('${repo_id}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day ORDER BY day

panels.title: Time to First Review p50 — hours
panels.description: PR opened → first review. Requires PR review facts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, argMax(pr_first_review_p50_hours, computed_at) AS value FROM repo_metrics_daily WHERE repo_id = toUUID('${repo_id}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day ORDER BY day
